participant_1.background: i'm pregnant with my first child. i read a book every week. i live with my husband in pennsylvania. i started a new job as a pa three months ago. my favorite kind of movie is a documentary.

participant_2.background: i visit europe twice a year. i'm a descendant of christopher columbus. i love to cook paella. i've a weakness for fish and chips. i am an art major in college.
